attributes.action: Make the secondary ticketing industry illegal.
attributes.additional_details: Examples of such sites are ticketmaster’s get me in and in some cases ticket prices have reached the hundreds of pounds.
attributes.background: Large secondary ticketing sites are currently able to purchase tickets for events immediately upon release to only sell them at a  much higher price. This is wholly unfair on individuals wanting to purchase tickets for themselves as often their only option is to pay a much higher price.
